MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the  LL74 and LL78 postcode areas of Tyn Y Gongl and Brynteg. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12.46pm. Our engineers are on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a 3rd party damage to our cable network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.55pm on 28th of April 2021.
